name: WithoutCowboy
description:
WARNING: Firefox is known not to show loading wheel so if you see a black screen you probably just need to wait a bit. 

WARNING#2: It is not recommended to play on phone at least due to the needed screen space and relatively small ingame buttons. (and also it might  just fail to work in general)

NUTSHELL:

  • "Western"-themed
  • Hard start
  • Has a frog! (was required)
  • Fast-paced
  • Questionably family-friendly (with vivid censorship)
  • Mostly tablet-drawn grafics (even parts that probably shouldn't)

TIPS: 

  • Cows need food, food in winter is hay
  • Hay is withdrawn each day in fixed amount (on the top panel)
  • This game is mouse-only, characters ( including cows and some buildings) are clickable
  • Toilets are not for cows
  • Disguise is a key to contact the human world and get things for milk... or for being handsome.
    • you can use your HAT to achieve this
    • people need a long time to get, be sure not to starve

DISCLAIMER: NO COWS/COWBOYS/WOMEN/FROGS OR OLIGARCHS WERE HURT IN MAKING THIS GAME 

GitLab repository:

https://gitlab.com/Houkime/withoutcowboy
